job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually. Studies show that companies spend up to 30% of their operational budgets on manual task management, often resulting in service downtime and frustrated customers.

   Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. By integrating advanced AI technology with deep technical expertise, we are not just solving problems reactively but proactively reshaping the entire support process. This approach is exciting because it sets a new standard in customer service efficiency and technical integration, making us a leader in the industry.

   This role is designed for those who thrive in high-tech, innovative environments. It is not a traditional engineering or support role; instead, it combines hands-on technical work with advanced AI tools to proactively optimize and automate complex support tasks. If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.

   In this role, you will be a crucial part of our dynamic team, implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. You will configure and maintain network functions to ensure seamless service delivery, analyze data to derive actionable insights, and manage incidents to ensure timely resolution. Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights. If you are ready to empower your career with advanced AI technology and make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply and join our forward-thinking team.

   What you will be doing

     * AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.
     * Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Answering the same questions over and over again
     * Providing trivial or basic troubleshooting
     * Writing knowledge base articles, * Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually. Studies show that companies spend up to 30% of their operational budgets on manual task management, often resulting in service downtime and frustrated customers.

   Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. By integrating advanced AI technology with deep technical expertise, we are not just solving problems reactively but proactively reshaping the entire support process. This approach is exciting because it sets a new standard in customer service efficiency and technical integration, making us a leader in the industry.

   This role is designed for those who thrive in high-tech, innovative environments. It is not a traditional engineering or support role; instead, it combines hands-on technical work with advanced AI tools to proactively optimize and automate complex support tasks. If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.

   In this role, you will be a crucial part of our dynamic team, implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. You will configure and maintain network functions to ensure seamless service delivery, analyze data to derive actionable insights, and manage incidents to ensure timely resolution. Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights. If you are ready to empower your career with advanced AI technology and make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply and join our forward-thinking team.

   What you will be doing

     * AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.
     * Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Answering the same questions over and over again
     * Providing trivial or basic troubleshooting
     * Writing knowledge base articles, * Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI tools to optimize and automate existing processes rather than developing or engineering AI models themselves. While it mentions 'AI System Building', the context suggests implementing and managing AI-driven systems and tools, not core AI model development. The role emphasizes scripting, system configuration, and troubleshooting within a telecommunications context, aligning more with an application support or operations role that leverages AI, rather than a dedicated AI engineering role. There is no mention of core AI/ML tasks like algorithm development, model training, fine-tuning, or building RAG systems.

job_tasks.justification: The job description begins by outlining industry problems (operational inefficiency, customer dissatisfaction) and how the company's AI-driven approach addresses these, indicating a need to understand the business context and strategic goals.
job_tasks.phrase: In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually.

job_tasks.justification: The description highlights how the company is 'revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction,' showing alignment with strategic goals.
job_tasks.phrase: Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires 'scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting,' which are foundational software development and system administration skills.
job_tasks.phrase: If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'implementing and managing AI-driven systems' and 'configuring and maintaining network functions,' which falls under operational management and deployment of systems.
job_tasks.phrase: implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'analyze data to derive actionable insights' suggests tasks related to data processing and analysis, which are part of data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: analyze data to derive actionable insights

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'manage incidents to ensure timely resolution' is a core responsibility in operations and incident management.
job_tasks.phrase: manage incidents to ensure timely resolution

job_tasks.justification: The core task of 'AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools' involves building and deploying systems, which aligns with software development, albeit with an AI focus.
job_tasks.phrase: AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.

job_tasks.justification: The task of 'Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions' involves configuring and maintaining specific network services, which is a form of system and application configuration.
job_tasks.phrase: Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights' indicates alignment with business strategy.
job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights.

job_tasks.justification: While the job mentions 'AI-driven systems' and 'AI tools', it does not specify tasks related to developing, training, fine-tuning, or adapting AI models themselves. The focus is on using these systems and tools.

soft_skills.phrase: optimize and automate complex support tasks
